## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like.

## Problem It Solves
What problem does this feature solve? Why do you need it?

## Proposed Solution
How do you think this should work?

## Alternatives Considered
What other approaches have you thought about?

## Privacy Impact
Does this feature affect data privacy or local processing?
- [ ] No privacy impact
- [ ] Might affect privacy (explain below)

## Portability
Does this work across all platforms?
- [ ] Works on Linux
- [ ] Works on macOS
- [ ] Works on Windows
- [ ] Platform-specific (explain below)

## Additional Context
Any other context, mockups, or examples.

## Are You Willing to Contribute?
- [ ] Yes, I can implement this
- [ ] Yes, I can help test this
- [ ] No, just suggesting
